name: Doctor Cat
description:
In Doctor Cat you will one day live in a society of cats! Step into the shoes of Doctor Cat, a renowned psychologist, and take care of cute patient cats by discovering their stories and helping them overcome their traumas.

Complete jigsaws based on your patients' stories to unlock each of their stories


Read stories based on real trauma and reflect on your learnings


  • 12 cats with captivating stories;
  • 12 jigsaws based on your patients' stories;
  • Calm and relaxing music to make your experience better;
  • Minimal and cartoon arts;
  • Easy Mode 6x6, Normal Mode 8x8 and Hard Mode 10x10;
  • Gallery that unlocks a more difficult mode for your already finished levels;
  • Jigsaws randomly generated to replay as many times as you want;

Will you be able to complete all the jigsaws and take care of all your patients trauma?
